t: Baldor Electric Company – Heritage brand
s: Baldor Electric Company marketed, designed, and manufactured Baldor-Reliance® industrial electric NEMA motors and Dodge® mechanical power transmission products. A US-based company, Baldor was the global leader in NEMA motors and a US leader in mounted bearings and enclosed gearing.

t: Baldor Electric Company is now ABB | News center
s: ABB will integrate the Baldor Electric Company name into its global ABB brand as a part of its Next Level strategy, which includes harmonizing different ABB-owned brands under the global ABB master brand.
